{"step_by_step_thinking": "The modified Bishop score takes into account cervical dilation, effacement, and station. In this case, the cervix is 1 cm dilated, 30% effaced, and at -1 station. According to the modified Bishop score, the cervical dilation score is 0, the effacement score is 2 (more than 1 cm), and the station score is 1 (between -2 and +2). Adding up these scores, the modified Bishop score for this lady would be 3.", "answer_choice": "B"}
